1.content:
Today was your mothers birthday, its going to be awesome! She always orders amazing food, sets up games, and makes it one of the best days of the year!

You hop out of bed, grab your present and head downstairs.

You see your sister sitting at the kitchen table texting on her phone, and you see your mother cooking up breakfast at the stove.

Before we go any farther, what species is your adoptive mother?
1.title: Happy bithday!

11.content:
Your mothers name is Julia. She is a beautiful gray wolf, she's taller than you standing at about 6' tall. Your mom has nice D sized boobs, and a decent sized ass.

You walk up behind your mother and give her a hug. "Happy birthday mom!"

Julia still cooking smiles and says "thanks son! I'd hug you back, but I'm kinda in the middle of food."

"Understandable" you say sitting at the table. "So sis, whats your plan for today?"

Your sister just looks at you. "Can't you just call me by my name. You make it sound like were living the American dream by saying "sis""

"Alright, then what are you up to today Molly?" You say to your sister.

"I might hang out at a friends house tonight, we'll see what the plan is." She said going back to her phone.

"Cool, so what's your plan for today mom?" You ask.

"I dont know, we could do pretty much whatever we want! We could go out to dinner, we could see a movie, we could go shopping at the mall, we could just stay home all day. What ever everyone wants to do." She said preparing plates of food.

What would you want to do today?
11.title: Wolf

choices: Lets go to the lingerie shop
Lets go to the food court
112.content:
"I guess we could go to the mall mom." You say as she hands you your breakfast.

"Great choice, now do you want to come with us Molly?" She asked handing Molly her breakfast.

"No thanks, I'm hanging with Jenna tonight" your sister said digging into her meal.

"Alright son, i guess its just you and me today." Your mother then sits down and eats her breakfast. After breakfast you shower and get ready for the mall. You both chat about various thing on the drive over. Eventually you get to the mall, and you head in.

"So where do you want to go mom?" You ask your mother.
112.title: Go to the mall

choices: Your mother gets your opinion on a outfit
1121.content:
"Oooh! Lets go to werewolf lingerie!" Your mother says in excitement as she looks over to the store. You follow behind as she runs in grabbing a cute top sitting on the shelf. "Oh my, is it cute! Hold onto this dear." Your mother then runs off to the next thing, and the pile on your arms starts to grow.

After a while of wondering around the shop, you and your mother head to the change rooms to try on some stuff. Julia grabs the stack of clothes, and jumps into the changing room, and your left standing outside awkwardly. That's until...
1121.title: Lets go to the lingerie shop

1123.content:
"Oh, i don't know, how about you decide on where to go first." Your mother says to you.

You look around the mall trying to think of somewhere to go you see a couple stores that spark an interest. "How about the toy store? Or how about that elixir shop that just opened up?"

What does your mother say?
1123.title: Idk, how about you decide?

choices: "Is There One To Turn My Children Into Wolf Pups?"
"Is There One That Shrinks It's Drinker?"
"Is There One That Can Allow Me To Become Pregnant?"
11232.content:
"Let's go to the Elixir Shop," You're mom votes.

You reply, "Sounds great. It'll be exciting to see what concoctions they have in there."

Your mom smiles, and the two of you walk over into the shop. You are soon greeted by a Lioness, a Kangaroo Doe (Female Kangaroo), and a Vixen. "Why hello young man. Madam Wolfess, how may we assist you today?" The vixen asked.

Now, before we go further. It is not abnormal for anthros to see other anthros with adopted human children. In fact, it is considered quite common in your community. You had a few friends who were humans with Anthro parents, be it one or both, so you were not seen as a one off in the community.

"Oh, we're just browsing right now," Your mother answers.

"Well, feel free to look around. But please do not test drink any of the elixirs. We don't want chaos in the store, like a previous shop had a few blocks from the mall," The Kangaroo said as she pulled out more Elixirs that had been stored in her pouch, as her pouch doubled as a storage bag for supplies.

"Understood ma'am," You reply politely.

"Other than that, if you need assistance with anything, or have something you want specifically, ask us and we'll help. We have everything from age reversal elixirs, to lactation elixirs, to just pain relief elixirs, we even have legal strength enhancement elixirs, which varies on what kind of strength you are looking for. That's just a few examples, again, feel free to ask us about anything," The Lioness stated.

You and your mother nodded. This was your mom's birthday, so whatever Elixir she wanted, you would get for her, be it for her, or yourself to drink. And you had the money, thanks to saving up from jobs and some relatives sending some gift money out of love for you and your family. You had to admit, while looking around, some of these elixir's intrigued you.

An elixir for reversing your age physically? You could look like an adorable 4 year old toddler if your mom wanted according to what the Elixir said it could do. An Elixir that could enlarge your mother's breast cup size, be it just for looks or to carry more milk in her breast, should she also decide lactate? And even one where your mom could allow you to enter her womb, without strain, stress, or complications, at any age? These ladies weren't kidding when they said their elixir's could do anything. You then hear your mom ask innocently, "Just out of curiosity,
11232.title: The Elixir Shop

choices: "Get Tiny Tot for my Son and Daughter?" She wants her pups back to being cute.
"Get the Swap and Regular?" You or your sister are getting a gender change.
"Get Mama's Milk?" Mama's willing to take mixed results for some kinky time.
"Ask what this other Transformation Elixir is?" She's too curious not to know.
112321.content:
"Oh yes. We do have transformation elixirs of many sorts. Though, for any one of them, we do need a fur sample of the animal they will transform into, and also understand, should this be consumed by your children, they will become your children by blood, and new birth certificates will be given out by us. We've talked with the authorities, to ensure we were given this permission. Not much just one tiny bit of fur. Now for options we do have "Regular" which basically just tranforms the one drinking the elixer to into the animal, who's fur sample was taken. No other changes other then species. Same age and gender, and personality as before. There is "Tiny Tot", which will not only tranform your children into your species, but will reverse their age to what would be their puppy days, so they can experience being a wolf from the very beginning, in your family's case. The results of how young they get varies a tad. The oldest we've had are 5 year old tots once the transformation elixir is consumed. The youngest being about 6 months old. So we have diapers available with this option, cause, well, even the 5 year old tots have their accidents. There is "Swap" which not only transforms the drinker into the new species, but also swaps their gender. So your son here would become your daughter if he consumed said elixir. With Swap, we can offer a combo deal where you can also obtain an Age Elixir for a dollar more then Swap Elixir alone. We have one elixir called "Mama's Milk" for female drinkers only, who, once they consume it, the potion works through their breast milk, and yes, they do start to lactate once they take the Elixir. Some families have chosen this one to get a little, well, "kinky", but we don't judge. However, this elixer, we should warn, has had mixed results, ranging to just transformation, to age reversal coming along with the transformation of the one drinking the breastmilk, to transformation, age reversal, and gender swap all happening together when one drinks the breastmilk. We think it may depend on the mood of the one who drank the elixir, but we can't be sure ourselves. There is one other elixer that allows transformation, but this is done in a way most don't usually request to go," the Vixen stated, not sure if she should mention what the last one does exactly.

The question really was, would it peak your mother's curiosity?

After hearing that you would most likely be the one taking whichever Elixir your mother chose, you were amazed at the different options. But the choice was ultimately your mother's to make. Your mom finally asks, "Can I..........."
112321.title: "Can I make my children Wolf like me?"

choices: To purchase the "Bun In The Oven" elixir.
To purchase one of the other elixirs to turn you wolf the shop owners mentioned.
To look at other elixirs before she considered the Wolf Transformation Elixirs.
1123215.content:
"Can I ask what this other transformation elixir is that you mentioned others don't usually do. I'm too curious, and I think I might decide to be daring if I find the potion interesting," You mom states.

The Lioness is surprised, but it wasn't her place to dictate what elixir your mother chose, so she responded, "Well, this other elixir is what we call the "Bun In The Oven" elixir. With this elixir, it is only for females, who are looking to be mothers, and allows them to, ahem, let their children, be they adopted of the same or different species, or be they blood related, to enter the place where babies are made. You know it as Unbirth. Basically, you will have the ability to unbirth your family members, adopted or blood, and regress them in your tummy. If the ones you unbirth are of a different species, they are not only regressed, but transformed into your species. Your son here would become your actual fluffy little pup. And you can also do this as many time as you like. They just restart from baby stage again. But there is some drawback. For one, you will not be able to rebirth them for 9 months, just like a normal pregnancy, since that's how long the transformation takes and regression takes. For another, you'd also have to sign an agreement to allow authorities to be keeping an eye on you. We don't want mothers going stir crazy and just abducting random citizens, and making them all her children without consent. Before that was put in place, one Tigress had been able to unbirth a whole town, turning them all into her cubs, and had authorities not restrained her, she could have gotten to thinking the entire country, if not world could become her children, with no other species left. As soon as they did restrain her, the law was put in place to keep mothers from getting any dominating ideas, but sadly, the government couldn't convict her of crime, so all those people are her cubs now. There is also the fact that if you do take this Elixir, your children will have no recollection of their former life when they are unbirthed and regressed. They will start anew. And for another thing, you also agree that if you wish to unbirth anyone, it has to be by their consent if they are your children, adopted or blood, and if they are not, it has to be brought to the court to let you know if the circumstances allow it."

This surprised your mother and you greatly. A Tigress, unbirthing a whole town? That was a feat, but it just seemed wrong, even to your mother. She'd be all for having more pups, but never make them hers by force. She could coax them into wanting to be hers, since there was no harm in that, nor was it illegal, but never, in her wildest imagination could she see herself abducting someone to make her pup, so she was happy the law was put in place to prevent such things. And you. Of course, if your mom requested it of you, you'd gladly be her baby boy pup, or girl pup, if your mom chose this route and it possibly changed your gender. Plus, you wanted your "puppy" days back. You didn't want to admit it, cause you didn't want your mom to be forced into making you a pup, even if opportunity knocked. You're not sure your sister felt the same way, but this was just how you felt.

After much thought, your mom decides.........
1123215.title: Bun in the Oven.

choices: "Can I get Speedy Elixir?" She wants give you a new sibling fast.
"Can I get one of the Delay Elixirs?"
"Can I get I get the Multiple?" She might ask for Combo with this too.
112323.content:
"Yes. There are many varieties with the pregnancy one, or as we also call fertility elixir, allowing even mothers who could not bare children in the womb before to have the same joy as other mothers, and also ensures no miscarriages happen. There is Normal, which allows you to enjoy a normal pregnancy period. There is Speedy For those who want their little ones to be cradled in their arms by the end of the week. There is Delay 1, 2, 3 and 4 Where each number is the amount of years a little one's birth is delayed. We are still working on Delay 5 for mothers who want to carry their babies up to 5 years, so that one's not on our shelves yet. There's also Multiple so the mother can carry more then one child. The bigger the bottle, the more little ones will be in the mom's tummy. We're only selling ones that will allow a mother up to 4 little ones to grow in her tummy at once at this point. There is also Combo, Which allows you to combine Multiple with Speedy or one of the Delay Elixirs. Normal was a default elixir in the mixture of Multiple elixir. There is one special fertility elixir that we can offer, but most mothers usually decide on the other one we offer," The lioness responded.


Your mother scratched her chin before asking...........
112323.title: "Ones to make me Pregnant?"

choices: "Let my children have their little kid days back?"
112324.content:
Okay, so she didn't want to find an elixer that made you a wolf like her. She didn't want one that made someone shrink in size, and she didn't want to get pregnant again. So what does she ask the other ladies in the shop?

She asks, "Is there an Elixer that can......."
112324.title: Other Questions.

1123241.content:
"Well, yes. We have several types of breast elixirs: "Normal", which makes your breasts larger. "Hourglass", which makes your breasts, ass and hips larger. "Multiplier", which not only larger your breasts, but also gives you extra pair as well. "Cocoa", which alongside larger your breast, changes your milk into cocoa. there's also several other flavors, like vanilla, coffee and blueberry. "Super", which makes your breast three times larger than "Normal" one. Last but not least, we have "Special", which is you can pick two previously mentioned version", Kangaroo Doe told.

Your mother think a moment and finally decided: "Great, I will pick..."
1123241.title: "Give me larger breasts (And possibly milk)...

154.content:
It was early morning and you were quietly making breakfast as one of the maids came in. Hilda was the head maid and like all of the staff and mistress, she was also a skunk as well. Wearing the typical French maid, it greatly displayed her triple f-cup and showed off her sexiness, though she always had a bored expression across her face.
"Young Master, You should let us do this work, not yourself," she said (not visibly) worried.
"Then how am I suppose to show the love I have for Mom?" You reply, a thin smile growing on Hilda's face, which was a rare sight.
"If the kid wants to do it, by all means, let him do it then," Sarah, the chef, added in as she returned from the bathroom.
Sarah was a big butter ball, her belly sticking out by several feet and her breasts were just as big as her head, if not bigger. Her ass was so big that you and your sister often got trapped inside the crack of her white, chef pants-cover ass and it would take a while before anyone would notice your disappearance.
"I suppose you'll need some help getting the food to her then?" A gruff voice asked, a very muscular skunk entering the kitchen.
Anastasia, or Ana, stood over 8 feet tall and each of her muscles were buffed up that she could pick up a pick-up with ease, something that she proved. Working as the butler, the Russian ex-mercenary was covered in scars all over her body, a nasty one taking out her left eye and an eye patch covered it up. Despite her scary appearance, she was quite laid back and had no problems seducing a man by her well developed breasts and firmly plump ass.
"Thanks, I'm just about done... And, there we go," you said, finishing the last minute details and gathering everyone, they all gathered the food and brought it towards your mother's room, Hilda scolding Sarah for trying to eat the food.
As you guys paraded through the hallways, a hyper voice called out to you.
"Hhhhhheeeeeeyyyyyy~ you guys! Whatcha you doing!?" CC hollered as she excitedly ran towards you, much to Hilda's dismay.
CC didn't reach the height of your chest, giving her quite the childish appearance, despite her being older than you. Another thing that set her apart was her massive backside, each cheek bigger than her head twice. Wearing a pair of blue overalls that greatly outlined her rump over a green shirt, the gardener was usually dirty, flinging mud from her soiled gloves.
"I've told you not to come in here unless you're clean!" Hilda hissed, but CC paid no mind as she effortlessly carried you off to your mother's room.
Opening the door, you could see your other half squatting over your mother's sleeping face and gives you a wink before grunting. Over the years, your twin developed some really nice curves, giving her a super model body. Speaking of super models, your mother, Eve, slept soundly and without a care. Bearing tits of the double K-cup and an ass even bigger than double the size of her breasts, so it was hard to imagine that she was single.
If it wasn't for the fact that she had such a sensitive bowels and farted for every minute, despite a lack of food in the system. This required a unique staff that wouldn't be too bothered by and the current staff was far more than perfect for this herculean task, even breaking wind themselves. This was also a habit your sister picked up on as her own backside roared into Eve's face, the skunkess slowly opened her eyes.
"Morning, sweetheart," she greeted her adopted daughter before pushing out a lengthy fart of her own, blowing away the blanket from her body and releasing the ungodly, sewage smell from the night's flatulence.
"No fair! I want to join in too!~" CC complained, turning around and pushing out an earthy fart.
The others shrugged their shoulders and began to expel colon fumes from their bottoms until it became to hard to breath. Once they had their fill, Eve thanked you for the meal and began to dress up in her CEO clothes of a black blazer revealing a lot of her cleavage and a pencil skirt that hugged her lower half tightly.
"So, Eric, Cindy, I have a couple of ideas of what to do today for my birthday," Eve said, finishing her breakfast as a petite burp exits her mouth before a not so petite fart explodes out of her and adjusts her glasses.
What does she do for her birthday?
154.title: Stinking rich milf

info.brief_description: You and your sister were adopted by your new mother, and this is the story.
info.description:
You and your sister are both anthro red foxes, living in an anthro world


When you and your sister were born, you were both put up for adoption. You and your sister were quite inseparable, so you were put up for adoption as a pare. Unfortunately not many people wanted to adopt a set of twins. So you both spent most of your child hood in an orphanage.

The orphanage wasn't too bad. It was kinda like being at a elementary school, except you stayed after school to play with the other kids till bed time.

It was a few weeks after your 10th birthday, when a rich woman around 24 years old came into the orphanage. She had recently found out she couldn't have children on her own, so she decided to adopt a kid. She decided she wanted to skip the baby step, and went with a older kid. When she saw you and your sisters profile, she had a little tug on her heart, and adopted you both.

Soon enough, you both move into your new home with your new mother, and have an amazing time growing up.

Its now 6 years later, and your celebrating your mothers 30th birthday. This is where the story starts

You can do pretty much what ever you want in this story, from having zero sex, and keeping it clean. To a full out incestuous love story!

Not many rules other than try to have good writing, and have fun!
